scripts.stage: npm run build && publisssh ./build demo.zooniverse.org/penguins && npm run clean-up
scripts.beta: npm run build && publisssh ./build zooniverse-static/www.penguinwatch.org/beta && npm run clean-up
scripts.deploy: npm run build && publisssh ./build zooniverse-static/www.penguinwatch.org && npm run clean-up
